title: Musuko no Tomodachi ni Okasarete (The Cougar Trap)
synopsis: Yoko is happy. She lives a peaceful life with her husband, Masahiko, and their son, Kazushi. But there is one thing she complains... They haven't had sex for a long time. One day, a friend of Kazushi comes to her house. His name is Ryouto. He is handsome and polite. But she doesn't know yet that Ryouto has a secret personality...
characters: ['Serimiya, Youko', 'Mitsuka, Misao', 'Serimiya, Kazushi', 'Mitsuka, Ryoto', 'Serimiya, Masahiko', 'Serimiya, Kana', 'Konami']
staff: [['Yoneda, Mitsuhiro', ['Director']], ['Oda, Non', ['Original Creator']], ['Suginami, Daifuku', ['Key Animation']], ['Tsubone, Kentarou', ['Editing']]]
